snippet: Semyon Varlamov made 43 saves, and Blake Comeau scored in the third period and the shootout to lift the visiting Colorado Avalanche to a 3-2 victory over the Detroit Red Wings.
abstract: Colorado Avalanche defeat Detroit Red Wings, 3-2, in shootout; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Semyon Varlamov made 43 saves, and Blake Comeau scored in the third period and the shootout to lift the visiting Colorado Avalanche to a 3-2 victory over the Detroit Red Wings.
